title: How Hard is it to get cse
content: Hey how hard is it to get a rank between 700-1000 in pessat. I'm trying to go for cse. Can an average student like me score good if I work hard in these last 20 days??

comments.body: Its not that difficult to get CSE at PES, at least in recent years given that the number of CS seats is now close to 2k and the fees has also increased exponentially. Just prepare as you are doing for JEE and PESSAT should be straightforward. The difficulty is always around KCET level.
I gave PESSAT 2 years ago, didn't study anything and randomly selected options for most of the questions and got 8XX rank. 20 days of studying is more than enough.
